alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Training thunderstorms will impact portions of Gilchrist and southern Suwannee Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from Mayo to 6 miles southeast of Trenton. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. Affected area has received about 0.5 to 1.5 inches of rainfall. Storms could bring another 0.5 to 1 inch of rainfall. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Bell, Obrien, Luraville, Branford and Hildreth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
